articles.title: 12PM: Louisiana expected to expand vaccine eligibility - WWLTV.com
articles.description: Starting immediately, Louisiana residents 16 years old and older with certain pre-existing health conditions will be eligible to receive the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine.
articles.content: NEW ORLEANS Louisiana Gov. John Bel Edwards announced a major expansion of the COVID-19 vaccine eligibility on Tuesday, exactly one year after the first case of the disease in the state was confirmed… [+2153 chars]
